resources.string:
Welcome to QuickConnectEase, your gateway to seamless and secure remote access to home server resources.
 At QuickConnectEase, our vision is to empower users with the convenience of accessing their files and data from anywhere, at any time, while prioritizing security and reliability.
As a team of dedicated developers, we embarked on the mission to create QuickConnectEase as our Diploma's Final Year Project, leveraging our collective expertise in software development and networking.
 Behind QuickConnectEase is a team of six dynamic individuals:
 1) Sushil Bharudkar
 2) Ishan Chipate
 3) Krishna Choundiye
 4) Piyush Holkar
 5) Shubham Jadhav
 6) Pratik Shinde
